name: MXSegmentedPager
summary: Segmented pager view with Parallax header.
description:
MXSegmentedPager combines [MXPagerView](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/MXPagerView) with [HMSegmentedControl](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/HMSegmentedControl) to control the page selection.
The integration of [MXParallaxHeader](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/MXParallaxHeader) allows you to add an parallax header on top while keeping a reliable scrolling effect.
